_meta.description: Default experiment presets for the Debug Framework Agent. common = product-agnostic; GNR/CWF/DMR = product-specific presets (boot_cases, content_cases, fuse_collection).
_meta.usage: Agent loads this file on Mode 1 startup. User picks a preset by number/name; agent pre-fills all fields and only prompts ask_user fields.

dmr_boot_baseline.label: DMR — Boot Baseline
dmr_boot_baseline.description: DMR boot baseline (PYSVConsole). Halts at 0xbf000000. Check Core 32. No reset.

dmr_dragon_base_h.label: DMR — Dragon Base H
dmr_dragon_base_h.description: Standard DMR Dragon mesh loop (H bin). Check Core 24. Includes TOR dump post-process.

dmr_dragon_base_m.label: DMR — Dragon Base M
dmr_dragon_base_m.description: DMR Dragon mesh loop — M bin content. No post-process.

dmr_dragon_base_r.label: DMR — Dragon Base R
dmr_dragon_base_r.description: DMR Dragon mesh loop — R bin content.

dmr_cfc_vbp.label: DMR — CFC Voltage (vbP)
dmr_cfc_vbp.description: DMR CFC voltage bump sweep. Range -0.03 to +0.06 V, 0.03 V steps.

dmr_cfc_flatr.label: DMR — CFC Frequency Flat
dmr_cfc_flatr.description: DMR CFC frequency flat sweep. 8-12 GHz, 4 GHz steps.

dmr_ia_flatr.label: DMR — IA Frequency Flat
dmr_ia_flatr.description: DMR IA frequency flat sweep. 8-24 GHz, 4 GHz steps.

dmr_ia_vbp.label: DMR — IA Voltage (vbP)
dmr_ia_vbp.description: DMR IA voltage bump sweep. Range -0.03 to +0.06 V, 0.03 V steps.

dmr_slice_base.label: DMR — Dragon Base Slice
dmr_slice_base.description: DMR single-core Slice mode (core 24). Slice pseudoSBFT tester content.

dmr_corehi.label: DMR — Dragon Base COREHI (Core 1)
dmr_corehi.description: DMR RO mesh targeting Core 1 (higher). Disable 1 Core = 0x2.

dmr_corelo.label: DMR — Dragon Base CORELO (Core 0)
dmr_corelo.description: DMR RO mesh targeting Core 0 (lower). Disable 1 Core = 0x1.

dmr_slice_cbb0.label: DMR — Slice_CBB0
dmr_slice_cbb0.description: DMR Slice CBB0 targeting Check Core=7. pseudoSBFT slice content.

dmr_slice_cbb1_32.label: DMR — Slice_CBB1_32
dmr_slice_cbb1_32.description: DMR Slice CBB1 targeting Check Core=32. pseudoSBFT slice content.

dmr_slice_cbb1_48.label: DMR — Slice_CBB1_48
dmr_slice_cbb1_48.description: DMR Slice CBB1 targeting Check Core=48. pseudoSBFT slice content.

dmr_slice_cbb2.label: DMR — Slice_CBB2
dmr_slice_cbb2.description: DMR Slice CBB2 targeting Check Core=84. pseudoSBFT slice content.

dmr_slice_cbb3.label: DMR — Slice_CBB3
dmr_slice_cbb3.description: DMR Slice CBB3 targeting Check Core=126. pseudoSBFT slice content.

dmr_corehi_cbb0.label: DMR — COREHI (Core 1) Cbb0
dmr_corehi_cbb0.description: DMR RO mesh targeting COREHI (Core 1), ATE mask Cbb0, Check Core=0.

dmr_corehi_cbb1.label: DMR — COREHI (Core 1) Cbb1
dmr_corehi_cbb1.description: DMR RO mesh targeting COREHI (Core 1), ATE mask Cbb1, Check Core=32.

dmr_corelo_cbb2.label: DMR — CORELO (Core 0) Cbb2
dmr_corelo_cbb2.description: DMR RO mesh targeting CORELO (Core 0), ATE mask Cbb2, Check Core=64.

dmr_corelo_cbb3.label: DMR — CORELO (Core 0) Cbb2
dmr_corelo_cbb3.description: DMR RO mesh targeting CORELO (Core 0), ATE mask Cbb2, Check Core=104.

dmr_corehi_compute0.label: DMR — COREHI (Core 1) Compute0
dmr_corehi_compute0.description: DMR RO mesh targeting COREHI (Core 1), ATE mask Compute0, Check Core=32.

dmr_corehi_compute1.label: DMR — COREHI (Core 1) Compute1
dmr_corehi_compute1.description: DMR RO mesh targeting COREHI (Core 1), ATE mask Compute1, Check Core=32.

dmr_corelo_compute2.label: DMR — CORELO (Core 0) Compute2
dmr_corelo_compute2.description: DMR RO mesh targeting CORELO (Core 0), ATE mask Compute2, Check Core=48.

dmr_corelo_compute3.label: DMR — CORELO (Core 0) Compute3
dmr_corelo_compute3.description: DMR RO mesh targeting CORELO (Core 0), ATE mask Compute3, Check Core=32.

dmr_fuse_generator.label: DMR — Fuse Generator
dmr_fuse_generator.description: Runs fuse_generation_dmr.txt. DMR-specific fuse override generation.
